mapper.insert:
select ORDERS_OID_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into orders (oid, oamount, OADDRESS, odate, ototal, users_uaid) values (#{oid},#{oamount},#{oaddress},sysdate,#{ototal},#{usersUaid})
insert into ORDER_ITEMS (OTID, OTPRICE, OTCOUNT,ORDERS_OID,OTDISCOUNT,BOOKS_ISBN) values (ORDER_ITEMS_OTID_SEQ.nextval,#{otprice},#{otcount},#{ordersOid},#{otdiscount},#{booksIsbn})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from users u, orders o, order_items ot
where o.users_uaid = u.uaid and ot.orders_oid = o.oid and ot.books_isbn = #{bookIsbn} and u.uaid = #{sessionUaid}
